resources.string: Write a description of your dream here
Write annotations about your dream here
Write the persons from your dream here, separated by semicolon (;)
Write the feelings from your dream here, separated by semicolon (;)
Write the locations from your dream here, separated by semicolon (;)
Select how comfortable you felt during the dream (0 = bad, 10 = good)
Select when you dreamt this dream (optional, default = today)
